parameters.name: NumberOfRows
parameters.description: Number of rows in the callout

parameters.name: Handler
parameters.description: Pointer to the event handler for the callout ( ISwCalloutHandler )

title: IModelDocExtension.CreateCallout
description: Creates a callout independent of a selection.
signature:
Callout CreateCallout( 
   System.Int32
NumberOfRows
,
   System.Object
Handler
)

parameters.name: NumberOfRows
parameters.description: Number of rows in the callout

parameters.name: Handler
parameters.description: Pointer to the event handler for the callout ( ISwCalloutHandler )

remarks:
This method allows you to create a callout independently of a selection. You can define the position of the callout using the
ICallout::Position
and
ICallout::SetTargetPoint
.
To create a callout dependent on a selection, use
ISelectionMgr::CreateCallout2
.
